scripts.test: npm run build:data && npm run test:data
scripts.build:data: cd src && poetry run construct-all && poetry run coverage
scripts.watch:data:full: nodemon --watch data --exec "npm run build:data && npm run test:data && npm --prefix conformance-search run copy:data"
scripts.watch:data: nodemon --watch data --exec "npm run build:data && npm --prefix conformance-search run copy:data"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run watch:data:full" "npm --prefix conformance-search run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:data" "npm --prefix conformance-search run dev"
